page.title: 01LETHAM AREA
page.content: A survey of this area is relatively easy to carry out for the area con- sists almost entirely of fertile farm- land.There is a total of 15 farms in this block and the average farm of around 200 acres is farmed as follows:_ {10}_Crops other than grass_{ 82% {11}Intensively-managed grassland_{14%} {12}Enclosed rough grazing_ {2%} {13 & 14}_Woodland_ {2%} ---- {100%} Crops are mainly barley and other cereals,potatoes,oil-seed rape and raspberries or other soft fruit. The village of Letham is the only residential area in the block lying to the north-west occupying about 1km sq.There are two estates-Balmadies at Ref 552 497 and Idvies at Ref 531 478.
